verbose_text: The results of the present study showed that in groups B and C, the disc height and IVD signal intensity significantly decreased over time, which is consistent with the process of IDD, while disc height and signal intensity in the PRP injection group did not change significantly, suggesting IDD inhibition in this group of animals.
evidence: IVD signal intensity significantly decreased over time, which is consistent with the process of IDD, while disc height and signal intensity in the PRP injection group did not change significantly, suggesting IDD
